text.text_translated:
For the last ten years, people criticized big supermarkets. They said the supermarkets did many bad things. They threw away a lot of food. They did not pay their suppliers enough money. They also used too much plastic for their packaging.

Packaging is the paper or plastic around food. This plastic was bad for the environment.

But now, supermarkets are starting to change. Customers were very angry about all the plastic that is thrown away. So, some big UK supermarkets made a serious promise. They will change their packaging and use less plastic.

best_attempt.text_translated:
For the last ten years, people said big supermarkets did many wrong things. They wasted a lot of food. They did not pay their suppliers enough money. They also used too much plastic for their packaging.

Packaging is the paper or plastic around food. This plastic was bad for the environment.

But now, supermarkets are starting to change. Many customers were unhappy about the plastic waste. So, some big UK supermarkets made a special agreement. They agreed to change their packaging and use less plastic.
